Unformatted text preview:With the internet and media these days, disinformation is everywhere and spread easily, with little to no fact-checking done in-between. Many people absorb this easy to consume information as it is the easiest to consume. People like getting an instant easy to understand answer to all their questions from Google. But the reality is that our world is very complicated and not everything has an answer yet. We need to have our own self filters in this age of vast amounts of easily available information. We need the ability to discern the validity of the information we accept and share with others.
